lead_paragraph: A student who held his social studies class hostage for several hours died at a hospital on Tuesday, the result of a self-inflicted gunshot wound that ended the standoff, the authorities said.
snippet: A student who held his social studies class hostage for several hours died at a hospital on Tuesday, the result of a self-inflicted gunshot wound that ended the standoff, the authorities said.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Young Gunman Is Dead After Standoff at High School
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Young Gunman Is Dead After Standoff at High School
